item.description:
We will be meeting for a delicious brunch at the Friendly Toast in Kendall. It's near Kendall Cinema, so that means a 10 minute walk from the actual T stop. Know thyself-- plan to come early if you're chronically late ;)

We only say this because it's impossible to delay ordering food! Once you've taken a look at the menu, you won't be able to resist. Don't say we didn't warn you. Omg Belgian waffles.

menu : http://thefriendlytoa...

Julie and Olivia will be there at 11 sharp to welcome all hungry heathens.

Directions:
T: If you come out on the side with flags down the middle of main street, look for Legal Sea Foods (behind the bus stops) and walk past, taking a right when you get to Galileo Galilei Way, then a left on Broadway. Follow the diagonal sidewalk onto Hampshire Street, you'll bump right into the Friendly Toast.
If you leave the T from the other side, take a left down Broadway and continue until you get to that diagonal sidewalk for Hampshire Street.
[For future reference, that's the same way you get to Flattop Johnny's, Tommy Doyle's, The Blue Room, and a bunch of other cool meetup places.]

Driving: From Boston take the Longfellow Bridge off of Storrow Dr. which becomes Broadway St. and turn rt. onto Hampshire St. The Friendly Toast is immediately on the right at 1 Hampshire St.
item.how_to_find_us: If you can't find us right away, ask for the Boston Atheists!
item.name: Sunday Brunch @ The Friendly Toast
